page.title: 07A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: I get up at 8.00 am and I play with my brother while mum makes the breakfast Then mum lifts my brother up and we all have breakfast together. After getting cleaned up I pack my bag ready for school.My sister and I cycle to school most days but if it is wet dad takes us up in the car.My school starts at 9,00,pm when my techer says the prayer.Usually we do maths next and lots of other things.We have play time then , go back into the classroom.We do some more work and then we have dinner.School finishes at 3.30pm and sometimes my friend comes home with me and we play a game together,then my friend goes home .We all have tea and watch television ,before bedtime I get washed. I go to bed and sometimes I read in bed before I fall asleep. sleep.
